bigrams.info: Whether to include a contiguous sequence of two items from a given sequence of text.

case_sensitive.info: Whether the analysis is case-sensitive or not.

number_of_topics.info: The number of topics that topic model will generate. If it is unset, it will be chosen automatically based on the number documents (i.e., row count).

term_limit.info: The maximum number of terms used for the topic model vocabulary. Computation is linear with respect to this parameter.

top_n_terms.info: The size of the most influential terms recorded.

topicmodel_seed.info: With a seed, the topic model is deterministic.

seed.info: A string to be hashed to generate deterministic samples.

out_of_bag.title: out_of_bag
out_of_bag.info: Setting this parameter to true will return a sequence of the out-of-bag instances instead of the sampled instances.

sample_rate.info: A real number between 0 and 1 specifying the sample rate.
sample_rate.title: sample_rate

range.info: The range of successive instances to build the topic model.
range.title: range

replacement.title: replacement
replacement.info: Whether sampling should be performed with or without replacement.
